author: potuz
content: Given that the discussion moved to EOF right after I suspect that you're conflating two different issues here: delaying deploying EOF, while I may be against it because of the way it was decided, I have no technical knowledge to oppose. Delaying deploying of withrawals because of a feature that will be not used anyway, was proposed after Shanghai was decided and can be added at any time, I think it's unacceptable
